About Orebit

Advanced Geological Solutions for the Modern Mining Industry

Orebit Geological Solutions develops professional R Shiny applications that transform how geoscientists and mining engineers approach data analysis. Our mission is to provide cost-effective, transparent, and powerful analytical tools that rival expensive proprietary software—without the prohibitive licensing fees.

The Challenge We Address

The mining industry faces a critical paradox: geological analysis demands increasingly sophisticated tools, yet traditional software solutions create barriers through:

  • High Costs: Enterprise geological software can exceed $50,000 per year in licensing fees
  • Vendor Lock-in: Proprietary systems limit flexibility and customization
  • Limited Transparency: Black-box algorithms make validation and reproducibility difficult
  • Accessibility Gaps: Small companies and consultants struggle to afford industry-standard tools

Orebit exists to eliminate these barriers.

Our Product Philosophy

Open-Source Foundation

All Orebit applications are built on open-source technologies, ensuring: - Complete transparency in analytical methods - Full reproducibility of results - No vendor lock-in or hidden dependencies - Community-driven development and improvement

Practitioner-Built Design

Our applications are developed by experienced geoscientists who understand real-world geological challenges. Every feature addresses actual industry needs, not theoretical requirements.

Professional-Grade Capabilities

We don’t compromise on quality. Orebit applications deliver enterprise-level functionality with: - Advanced statistical and geostatistical analysis - Interactive 3D visualization - Industry-standard reporting - Robust quality assurance protocols

Universal Accessibility

Cloud-native architecture means: - No installation required - Run directly in web browsers - Access from anywhere - Cross-platform compatibility

Product Suite

GeoDataViz (Available Now)

The Comprehensive Geological Data Analysis Platform

Our flagship application revolutionizes exploratory data analysis for geological datasets:

Core Capabilities: - Interactive drillhole data visualization - Advanced statistical analysis and validation - 3D geological modeling - Comprehensive QA/QC tools - Automated reporting

Industry Applications: - Mineral exploration data analysis - Resource estimation preparation - Grade control monitoring - Geological database validation

Try GeoDataViz Demo →

Resource Estimation App (Coming Q2 2025)

Professional Geostatistical Analysis

Advanced resource modeling capabilities including: - Automated variogram modeling - Multiple kriging techniques - Block model generation - Resource classification - Uncertainty quantification - JORC/NI 43-101 compliant reporting

Join Beta Program →

Pit Optimizer (Coming Q3 2025)

Strategic Mine Planning

Sophisticated optimization algorithms for: - Ultimate pit limit determination - Multi-criteria optimization (NPV, volume, grade) - Operational constraint modeling - Environmental impact assessment - Economic scenario planning - Pushback sequencing

Get Early Access →

Technical Foundation

Technology Stack

  • Framework: R Shiny for responsive web applications
  • Data Processing: tidyverse ecosystem for efficient data manipulation
  • Spatial Analysis: sf, sp packages for advanced geospatial operations
  • Geostatistics: gstat for comprehensive geostatistical modeling
  • Visualization: plotly for interactive, publication-ready graphics
  • 3D Rendering: Custom three.js integration for geological modeling

Performance & Reliability

  • Optimized for large geological datasets (100,000+ samples)
  • Efficient memory management
  • Real-time interactive visualization
  • Robust error handling and data validation
  • Automated testing and quality assurance

Enterprise Integration

  • Multi-format data import (CSV, Excel, databases)
  • Export to industry-standard formats
  • API-ready architecture
  • Customizable reporting templates
  • Scalable deployment options

Who We Serve

Exploration Geologists

Rapidly validate and analyze drilling data, identify trends, and optimize sampling strategies using professional-grade analytical tools.

Resource Geologists

Prepare data for resource estimation with comprehensive preprocessing workflows, domain analysis, and geostatistical validation.

Mining Engineers

Optimize mine planning with advanced pit optimization, economic modeling, and scenario analysis capabilities.

Consulting Firms

Deliver professional results to clients using transparent, reproducible analytical methods at a fraction of traditional software costs.

Educational Institutions

Teach modern geological data analysis with free access to professional-grade tools and comprehensive learning resources.

Junior Mining Companies

Access enterprise-level analytical capabilities without the capital requirements of expensive software licenses.

Our Commitment

Quality Standards

All Orebit applications meet or exceed industry standards for: - Analytical accuracy and precision - Data security and privacy - Reporting compliance (JORC, NI 43-101) - Professional documentation

Continuous Improvement

We actively develop new features based on: - User feedback and requests - Industry best practices - Technological advances - Regulatory requirements

Community Support

We believe in giving back: - Open-source code repositories - Comprehensive documentation - Tutorial videos and guides - Active user community - Responsive technical support

The Team Behind Orebit

Orebit is led by Ghozian Islam Karami, Senior Geologist and Certified BNSP Competent Person (CP) with over a decade of mining industry experience. His expertise in offshore tin exploration, resource evaluation, and geological data analysis ensures that every Orebit application addresses real-world geological challenges.

Core Expertise: - Geostatistics and resource modeling - R programming and Shiny application development - Quality assurance systems for mining operations - Geospatial analysis and 3D geological modeling

Professional Credentials: - Certified Competent Person (CP) - BNSP - M.Sc. Geological Sciences - KFUPM - B.Sc. Geology - Universitas Padjadjaran - Senior Geologist - PERHAPI

This combination of geological expertise and technical development skills ensures Orebit applications are both geologically sound and technically sophisticated.
